EmailTemplate.description: Customer Email (no existing account) Web Lead submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Customer Email (no existing account) Web Lead submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Office Depot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for contacting Office Depot in regards to setting up a Contract BSD account. I have forwarded your information to your local Office Depot Account manager who will be in contact with you.
Should you require any additional customer service assistance, please contact our Customer Service Center at 1-800-GO-DEPOT (1-800-463-3768). We are available to assist you 24-hours per day.
Thank you for choosing Office Depot!
